com.rey.material.app

Interface DialogFragment.Builder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatePickerDialog.Builder, Dialog.Builder, SimpleDialog.Builder, TimePickerDialog.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    DialogFragment

    public static interface DialogFragment.Builder
    Interface definition for passing style data.
